column1: '''''Amon Hen'' 271''' is the two-hundred-and-seventy-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)
* West Stow and Ring Quest 2018 - update
* Release of the first Aubusson Tisse Tolkien project tapestry
* "Seven for the Dwarf-lords in their halls of stone"
